sources.title: Porky's Road Race (1937)
sources.description: It’s race day, and first prize is $2 million (less $1,999,998.37 in taxes). Porky’s little car is matched against cars driven by stars of yesteryear, including Laurel and Hardy and Charlie Chaplin. When the black #13 driven by “Borax Karoff” makes a bid for the finish line, can Porky fend him off?

metadata.Plot: It's race day, and first prize is $2 million (less $1,999,998.37 in taxes). metadata.Actors: Billy Bletcher, Joe Dougherty, Bernice Hansen
